title: Do U.S. Gun Deaths Since 1968 Outnumber Deaths in All American Wars?
subtitle: A popular claim about gun-related fatalities revitalized after the 2017 Las Vegas mass shooting is fundamentally accurate, with some allowance for imprecision.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Since 1968, more Americans have been killed by guns than have been killed in all wars in U.S. history.
